text: adaraniya mandiramaya ka'abaye allahu manusyarasiyute nilanilpinulla adharamakkiyirikkunnu. adaraniya masam,balimrgam, avayute kaluttile atayalappattakal ennivayeyum. niscayamayum akasabhumikalilullatellam allahu ariyunnuvennum avan ella karyannalekkuriccum suksma jnanamullavananennum ninnal ariyananit
